short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a specific webpage at a specific time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Open Specific Time is a handy Chrome extension that allows you to schedule a specific webpage to open at a precise time. Whether you need to join an online meeting, catch a flash sale, or access any time-sensitive web content, this extension ensures that you never miss a critical moment.

Features:

Scheduled Page Opening: Set a URL and a specific time (down to the millisecond) for the page to open automatically.
Simple Interface: Easy-to-use interface where you can input the URL and the desired time in the format HH:MM:SS
.
Visual Confirmation: Get a visual confirmation once your time is set, ensuring you are all set for the scheduled page opening.
Persistent Storage: Your URL and time settings are saved and retrieved automatically, so you don't need to re-enter them each time you open the extension.
Customizable Appearance: Clean and modern design with a full white background and black text for clear visibility.
Never miss an important event or update with Open Specific Time. Set it, and forget it!
